trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore
There were no other sightings in Baltimore on or around April 10th 1992
Summary: silver sphere passed over my head
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at my brothers house helping him and his wife settle in,they had just bought the house about a month earlier.we had finished what we we're doing and we're standing in the driveway saying our goodbyes when a glint of light from the sun caught my attention,i looked up just in time to see a silver sphere come out of the suns glare and move west to east across the sky.it moved at a fairly rapid speed and when i asked my brother"did you see that" it was gone.it was pretty high in the sky about we're private jets fly. i've had people tell me it was probably a satellite but i've seen satellites before and they don't move that fast.it wasn't as fast as i could turn my head but it was faster than a jet at comparable altitude.after the incident my brother claimed to see the delta style crafts on several occasions.i can't verify his sightings as he passed away last october but he was very adamant about what he saw.all i know is what i saw and i don't care if anybody believes me.
